title: PrismAnalysis
description: Canonical schema for Prism analysis request and response. Extension and backend must align so UI and API stay in sync. Owner: Product/Demo Lead (schema design); Backend Lead and Extension Lead (consumption).

request.description: Payload sent from extension to backend: extracted content and metadata.

response.description: Payload returned by backend to extension: perspectives, optional bias, optional reflection.

label.description: Short lens name (e.g. Economic, Cultural, Institutional).

coreFraming.description: Optional one-line core framing for matrix column.

assumption.description: Optional key assumption behind this lens.

searchKeywords.description: Optional keywords for Google search to get more research on this perspective.

bias.description: Bias indicators; non-accusatory framing. Shape: indicators array (preferred) or free-form object.

indicators.description: Short labels, e.g. 'Emotional language', 'Authority emphasis', 'Economic framing'.

reflection.description: Optional reflection prompt or question for the user (e.g. which lens surprised you, what assumption does the original rely on).

pageSummary.description: 3 brief bullet sentences summarizing the page.
